thread.title: Hard quiz alert! Can you name EVERY player who has scored in the Merseyside derby since 2000?
thread.title_full: Hard quiz alert! Can you name EVERY player who has scored in the Merseyside derby since 2000?

author: Jon Moody
title: Hard quiz alert! Can you name EVERY player who has scored in the Merseyside derby since 2000?
text:
Sport Hard quiz alert! Can you name EVERY player who has scored in the Merseyside derby since 2000? Find the biggest thinking cap you own and glue it down on your bonce - you're going to need it Share Here's a reminder of the most recent... (Photo: Getty)   Thank you for subscribing!   
There's not long left to wait now until one of the most hotly-anticipated fixtures of the season. 
Liverpool host Everton in what will be the 228th Merseyside derby, with both sides eager to snatch all three points in their pursuits of European football. 
It's the sort of game which gets us very excited. We've already put together our WORST combined eleven to ever set foot on the pitch in the fixture and the rest of today will probably be spent daydreaming about what could happen after kick-off. 
Now it's time to put you in the hot seat with our latest fiendishly difficult - but very rewarding - quiz. How you'll probably look in about three minutes (Photo: Reuters) 
Your task is simple: you have 15 minutes to name every goalscorer in Merseyside derbies from the 2000/01 season onwards, including both Premier League and cup games. 
Easy! The only tough bit is remembering them all... 
Good luck - you're probably going to need it. Like us on Facebook
